alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 19 at 4:21AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Minnesota...Iowa... Mississippi River at Lansing affecting Vernon, Crawford, Houston and Allamakee Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Lansing. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.2 feet, Lock and Dam 9 goes out of operation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon.
